about_the_game:
Anti-Terrorist Shooting Game: A Thrilling FPS Experience

Step into the action-packed world of Anti-Terrorist Shooting Game, where you become an elite commando, tasked with defending your city from waves of terrorists. In this intense first-person shooter (FPS), you’ll engage in high-stakes missions to stop terrorism and bring peace to the war-torn streets. Featuring dynamic gameplay, modern weapons, and a variety of game modes, Anti-Terrorist Shooting Game offers an immersive FPS experience that will challenge your skills and strategy.

Dive into exhilarating multiplayer battles in our anti terrorist shooting game, where you can join forces with friends or face off against players worldwide. Experience dynamic gameplay with various modes that emphasize strategy, teamwork, and skill as you fight to dominate the battlefield.

Key Features:

Campaign Mode: Dive into multiple high-intensity shooting missions, each with unique objectives. From urban warfare to covert sniper operations, this mode will test your tactical expertise and combat skills.

Survival Mode: Stay alive as long as possible while facing relentless waves of enemies. This mode is all about endurance and precision as you shoot your way through endless attacks.

Multiplayer Mode (Online & Offline): Battle alongside or against other players in exciting multiplayer skirmishes. Whether you're playing with friends or competing against strangers, this mode delivers fast-paced, action-packed gameplay with multiple teams vying for dominance.

Zombie Mode: Take on hordes of undead enemies in this thrilling zombie shooter mode. Keep your defenses up and mow down zombies before they reach you. How long can you survive?

Defuse Mode: Step into the battlefield as you work to defuse bombs planted by terrorists. Neutralize enemies and prevent explosions in this high-stakes mode that blends strategy and skill.

Weapons & Arsenal:

Choose from a wide selection of modern weapons, including assault rifles, sniper rifles, shotguns, grenades, and more. Upgrade your loadout to better withstand enemy attacks and dominate the battlefield.

Gameplay Features:

Auto-Shooting: Focus on strategy while the game handles firing for you.

Swipe to Aim: Intuitive controls make it easy to target enemies with precision.

Grenades & Explosives: Maximize damage with well-timed grenade throws.

Armor & Health Management: Upgrade your gear to stay in the fight longer.

Tactical Combat: Timing your shots and managing your health will be crucial for survival.

name: Anti Terrorist Shooting Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: x64 with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 210 512MB DDR3
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Join elite forces in this fast-paced anti-terrorist FPS. Engage in tactical gunfights, master a variety of weapons, and outsmart enemy squads in immersive multiplayer battles. Your skills, reflexes, and strategy will be crucial for survival and victory!
